message.content:
cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DL. 

The paper discusses the challenge of efficiently organizing and indexing scientific documents, which falls under the category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed approach leverages encyclopedic background knowledge for enriching domain-specific ontologies, which involves techniques from Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The approach aims to improve both ontology-based methods and supervised machine learning, which are topics in Machine Learning (cs.LG) and Deep Learning (cs.DL).
